nodes.text: Odupiendo-racing was a racing sport that enjoyed a certain level of popularity in the waning decades of the Galactic Republic, though not as much as Podracing. It was one of the betting sports at the Outlander Club on Coruscant. In this fast-moving sport, flightless Odupiendos raced against each other in circular tracks. Betting on the sport was also allowed at the Canto Casino and Racetrack on the planet Cantonica.
